entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is the one who stepped over the great trunk and proceeded toward Grawp. He used a long, broken bough to poke Grawp in the middle of his back.

entities.name: grawp
entities.description: Grawp is the giant who was sleeping on the ground. He gave a roar when Hagrid poked him with the bough.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry and Hermione are present in the scene, but they do not take any action. They are being watched by Grawp.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is present in the scene, but she does not take any action. She is being watched by Grawp.

relationships.description: Hagrid poked Grawp in the middle of his back with a long, broken bough.
Grawp gave a roar when Hagrid poked him with the bough. This is an inverse relationship of 'poke'.
